articles.content:
The Queen and Prince Philip have both received the first dose of Covid-19 vaccinations, Buckingham Palace has confirmed.
The royal couple were given the jab by a doctor from the Royal Household at W… [+2715 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Queen Elizabeth and husband receive COVID-19 vaccines - palace - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's Queen Elizabeth and her husband Philip, both in their nineties, have received vaccinations against COVID-19, Buckingham Palace said on Saturday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
LONDON (Reuters) - Britains Queen Elizabeth and her husband Philip, both in their nineties, have received vaccinations against COVID-19, Buckingham Palace said on Saturday.
